body:
Comment 7: 
> make a simple test:
> ...
> ... observe in %TEMP% the folders being created on each `go test` run, aren't deleted

It does not happens here. If you see it happens on your side, perhaps you have an
antivirus program or something else that gets hold of that file, and that prevents us
from deleting it. If you like, you could try and investigate what is happening - procmon
should be able to help you here.

Alex
